10.4.2021.title: Meeting 4 (Speak Colors)
10.4.2021.description: Happy October! ðŸŽƒ The workshop this week will be Speak Colors. You will learn a few JS libraries and use HTML/CSS/JS to color your screen with your voice via speech recognition. Join us this Monday!

9.27.2021.title: Meeting 3 (Cookie Clicker)
9.27.2021.description: We're taking in feedback and suggestions to help improve our club! This week, we're going to take a step back and run a Cookie Clicker workshop, where you will learn more JavaScript fundamentals and create a clone of the popular Cookie Clicker game.

9.20.2021.title: Meeting 2 (Splatter Paint)
9.20.2021.description: Thanks to everyone who came to our first meeting! This week, we'll be running a Splatter Paint workshop, where you will be making a canvas website that you can splatter paint on using the Paper.js library.

9.13.2021.title: Interest Meeting 2021-22
9.13.2021.description: The very first Hack Club meeting at Blair! We will run a Personal Website workshop where you will learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JS and create your very own website from scratch.
